name: The Amnesiacc
description:
The Amnesiac is an adventure game. The story takes place in a little girl's house whose parents have mysteriously disappeared. The player's aim is to explore, discover the truth and what happened to her family. Throughout the game, the player's rabbit plush will guide her.  

The game is split into severals parts in order to find the truth. The player will find his diary, unlock it  and collect pages in order to solve the mystery...

Pc Controls ActionKeyboardGame BoyStartALTAInteractionALTAMoveArrow KeysD-Pad Features

The Amnesiac contains : 

  • 5 backgrounds 
  • 2 characters
  • 293 words storyline
  • Experience a mysterious story told over ~5-10 mins
  • Explore your house and don't forget to interact with every item
  • There is only one end
From many characters design ideas and backgrounds... We are honored to introduce you our game !

I hope you will enjoy playing this game. We worked hard on it because we weren't used to do pixel art, code... Maybe some of you will figure out  from which game we get inspired !  Who knows ? 

I also emphasize that you can add some musics, translate in english our game ! Every nice touch is accept ! Now, let's ENJOY !

CREDITS
  • A game produced by a team of graphic design's students
  • Artworks, code are entirely made by Florya, Fatima and Océane
  • Many thanks to Wilfrid, Nael and Lina for their support in this project
